justification: Team B (7-1, conservative, consensus-driven) won’t give a Tier 1 RB (even with a declining role) for a Tier 5 WR and a marginal TE upgrade. They value workhorse RBs and possession WRs; Martinez isn’t a possession WR and Turner isn’t a clear TE upgrade over their Tier 4. Rationale is internally inconsistent (“stable veteran RB” going to B) and probability is unrealistic. Minimal evidence of B’s perspective.
